title: The Preacher's Wife
description: In this next installment of the CHRONICLES OF A JUNKY series we meet Teresa Sanders. She was born into a royal family among Atlanta Georgia clergy. As the only child of a well respected minister and his wife she had the best of everything at her disposal. Curiosity entices young Teresa to explore life on the other side of the tracks. A whole new, exciting world of men, sex, and drugs opens for her. After she experiences what the hood has to offer including an act of violence that almost claims her life she is deeply affected and forever changed. She survives her forays into the ghetto and leaves it all behind for college.Family prestige and excellent grades grant her access to one of the most prestigious schools in the country. The pretty co-ed attracts men of all sorts, but only has eyes for one. Darrin Sanders was a rising star in ministry and in high demand himself. Fate pushes them together and they fall in love. The gorgeous couple marries after graduation and lives happily ever after. For a while.Teresa is once again lured back into Atlantas under belly. Can she make it out again? Or will she destroy herself and everyone around her? If you thought Willie Champion was bad, wait until you meet THE PREACHERS WIFE. LAWD HAVE MERCY!
author: Sa'id Salaam
